She never said she got out, Code.

::Zardus::

Zardus walks out of the CR chambers. He looks down at his wrist comp. All the 
alliance members were in the base. He frowns. That meant Dracona too....

"Computer, jam base entrance. Internal defences, open fire on Dracona. She is 
to be recognized as an enemy." He says into his wrist.

"Acknowledged." The base's computer replies. The alliance base's doors slam 
shut and autoguns pop up around Dracona, opening fire at her.

Zardus chuckles, taking out his gun and walking off, following Dracona's 
energy signature.
